name: scblocks
title: ScBlocks
description: Custom blocks for the new WordPress editor.
author: sc81

scripts.setup: composer install && npm install && npm run build && wp-env start
scripts.clean: wp-env stop && rm -rf build dist node_modules vendor composer.lock package-lock.json
scripts.makepot: composer wp -- i18n make-pot . ./languages/scblocks.pot --skip-audit --exclude=build,dist,node_modules,vendor,wordpress --headers='{"Last-Translator":"sc81","Report-Msgid-Bugs-To":"https://github.com/sc81/scblocks/issues"}' --file-comment="Copyright (c) 2020 sc81, LLC. All Rights Reserved."
